-styāstraya-kuḷatiḷakaṁ cāḷukyābharaṇaṁ śrīmad-bhūḷōkamalla-dēvara-vijaya-rājyam uttrōttarābhivriddhi pra
varddhamāna candrārkka-tārāṁbaraṁ saluttamire. śrīmad-bhūllōkamalla-kṣitipati-sakaḷāmmakammāvanī
śastūmaḥ śrīmauḷimāḷā maṇikiraṇa bhayacchanna pīthaṁ yaś-śrī-dhāmaṁ cāḷukya-cakrēśvara-natuḷa-baḷādbhā
si saṁpūrṇa-vidyāprēmaṁ viśvaṁ bharācakramananuyadiṁ pāḷisuttirddanāgaḷu.

lg.l: na kalvanatu barmagauḍan esedaṁ sale saṁ

div.p:
janani tangama
ḷaguṇamaṇi jananiyenalu peṁpavettu jagada janakke jananiyenisirdda jakkaveyene barmmagavuṁḍanaṁtu nōṁtavaroḷare.
vri.tanagayyaṁ negaḷdēcagauṇḍanakhiḷāśā kāvini ghāru caṁdanacarvṣe kriḷa caṁdrakāntivimaḷaśrīkīrtti vistāranārttanijāśēṣa mahā
kuṭuṁba bharaṇa kamaḷayuga madavatvaṭu caraṇaṁ manumārgga sadyaddagvanimācaraṇaṁ prākritane barmmagau
ṇḍa dhreyōlu.vritta. tanagamērugavādavuṁnati samasta-kṣīravārāsigaṁ tanagaṁ saṁda gabhīravritti taṇagaṁ sarvvōr vvigaṃ peṁpuvetta nitāsta
kṣame bhāvisalke sadriśaṁ tānādudeṁdandadādanō pēḷu bammagauṇḍanōḷu sadriśani viśvȧbharā cakradoḷu. pralayaprakṇōbhadoḷmereye
nadhikataraṁṭitāṭandagastyaṁ taḷadiṁteraysupīralkapanuja mahi,āṭōpavādattu rāmaṁ muḷidandebbhoṁde bhāṇkagidu tegedudende
ndu nicchaṁ èayōrāsiladgaṁbhīraneṁbuṁnatikege piriduṁnāṇbuvaṁ bammagauṇḍa.

vr̥tta. baliyaṁ kaṭṭiṭṭu pātāḷadoḷirisida kalvāvani
jaṁgaḷaṁ bhūtalalagnaṁ māḍadāgairikakudharamanayduttu baytuṭṭatanaṁ jaḷadhivyāvēṣvitōrvvitaḷame paḷiguveṁdaṁji padmōdbhavaṁ nirmmaḷa
-cittaṁ pettaniṁtītananesidapaṁ dānadiṁ bammagauṁḍa.kandaparanāri tiḷōttaveyoḷdore rūpinoḷenasitōrppaḍaṁ kanasinoḷaṁbe
rasada śuciyanena negaḷḍaṁ parāṅganā putran enipa bammagavuṁḍa kulavati suśīlavati kauśalavati negaldānukūlavati ritavati
bhāgale naṝi bhāryyeyene tanagalaghuyośaṁ bammagauṇḍanesedaṁ dhareyoḷ

vacana.iṁtenesida pogarttegaṁ negarttaṁ nele
yāda nāḷprabhu bammagāvuṇḍaṁ sukhadinirddoṁdu divasaṁ dharmmaprasaṁga niratanāgirppudumā prasṭhāvadoḷ.

kanda.
haracaraṇa kamaḷa bhriṅgaṁ varasāhasa tuṅganadhika kāntānaṅgaṁ parahita kriti prasaṁṅgaṁ nirasta dōṣānuṣaṅganenipaṁ boppa.

vr̥.
manumaṁ śaṁbhupadābjadoḷsuviḷasaccāritradoḷ dēhamaṁdhanamaṁ adava Eṣṭaviśiṣṭa tuṣṭigaḷoḷātmaśvaryya saundaryya yavvanamaṁ svātmaka
ḷatradoḷtaḷedanendaṁdanya sāmānyamarttyane pēḷ śrīśivadhatmmanirmmaḷa lasatsaṁtarppaṇaṁ boppaṇa.vacana. entu sakaḷa guṇama
ṇe vibhoṣeṇanesidasēnebōve boppimeyyaṁ barmmagāvuṇḍaṁ gabhimukhanāgi.kanda.dharmmametanagesahāyaṁ dharmmaṁ
tanagesevapemmevettābharaṇaṁ dharmmavē nidhitanagadaṟiṁ darmmamanārjjipudu puruṣanurvvitaḷadoḷ.

va. Adaṟiṁdav īy abbalūroḷ
śrī-brammēśvara-dēvasthānama nimmapitri-pitāmahāriṁ paripāḷitavāgi baritorddudī dharmmakke samapravāgi vr̥ttiyaṁ biṭṭu
koṭṭu nimagama vaṁśajaruṁ nīnuṁ kritārtthanappudeṁdu nuḍivudu madane manadigoṇḍu.vr̥. alliya saṭṭiguttaramaḷānvarva
jātarahīṁdrabhūṣaṇōtvulla padāṁbujōnmada madhu-brata-rāvagaveppattokkaluṁ sallalitōkkini suḍida dharmmamē sammatava
ntaṟendanoldilli samagravāgi meṟeyiṁ śivadharmmamahōnnatikkeyaṁ.vacana. eṁbuduṁ barmmagāvuṇḍa śivadharma kathāśravaṇa
maṇīkaṛapūranuṁ śivadharmmakathāvrita rasavarṣabahaḷita puḷakasasya sarasakēdāranumāgi śivabhaktibhāvinisa
māgamanarāgaṁ kaygaṇmutatkṣaṇadoḷuttuṅgamārūḍanāgi matturaṅgavallavaravatijavadiṁ parivudalli
varaṁ śrī brahmēśvara dēvargge bhūmiyaṁ neṭṭane biṭṭukoṭṭappaneṁdu pratijñārūḍhanāgi pariyisi haṇneya hāḷabayalo
ḷ eṁṭumattaru garddeyumaṁ Āṟu mattaru hāḷigūṭadaneneṇnoganuṁ hadinaydu mattaru beddaleyumaṁ hiriyu
kereyu keḷage nālku sāriradaḍakedōṁṭada sthaḷamumaṁ dēvarapuradōḷagippattu maneya nimēśanamumaṁ sarvvabādhā
